title: Terrifying Psychic Ability Of Hana
body:
Terrifying Psychic Ability Of Hana

Evan was looking at the night sky with a troubled look on his face, there were less than twelve hours left before the start of the tournament but Evan was thinking about a completely different matter.

"Just what the hell is wrong with me?" he muttered while sighing out loud.

He had a troubled look on his face not because of the dark guild or any other reason, he was troubled because of himself.

Earlier the students of clear sky academy also arrived at the hotel and just as Evan expected, the students who came from Clear Sky Academy were Sophie and others who were his teammates during the monster tide of Naphliam city.

Since they knew Evan is also participating in the tournament, Mark called him after arriving at the hotel. When Evan saw Mark was calling him, he didn't know why but for some reason he felt he didn't want to meet them. It was the same feeling that he got when Valery and others asked him if he want to roam around the city with them.
